title: Fact check: Democratic activists falsely claim Marjorie Taylor Greene refused to applaud Zelensky - CNN
content:
1. Fact check: Democratic activists falsely claim Marjorie Taylor Greene refused to applaud Zelensky  CNN
  2. Cheney Says Greene One of Kremlin's 'Useful Idiots' After Ukraine Remarks  Newsweek
  3. Analysis | A layer cake of misinformation, dishonesty and pro-Russia apologism  The Washington Post
  4. Marjorie Taylor Greene panned as ‘useful idiot’ for Putin after speech full of Biden conspiracy theories  The Independent
  5. Anonymous Threatens to 'Not Be Kind' to 'Russian Asset' U.S. Rep. Greene  Newsweek
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: After Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky delivered a virtual address to Congress on Wednesday, a claim went viral among some Democrats on Twitter: Georgia's Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene, a right-wing Republican, had refused to applaud Zelensky.
